description: Try our easy to follow Classic Crème Brûlée recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Classic Crème Brûlée Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 vanilla pod, split in half lengthwise

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 140°C. Heat the cream and vanilla bean in a saucepan over low heat until simmering. Remove from the heat and let stand for 1 hour.

Using the tip of a knife, scrape the seeds from the vanilla bean into the cream. Discard the bean or save for another use. Whisk the egg yolks and granulated sugar together in a bowl. Whisk in the cream mixture. Strain through a wire sieve into a glass measuring cup. Pour equal amounts into six 175ml ramekins. Place the ramekins in a roasting pan and add enough hot water to come halfway up the sides.
Bake until the custards are barely set, about 40 minutes. Remove the ramekins from the pan and cool. Cover with plastic wrap and chill in the refrigerator at least 2 hours.

To serve, position a broiler rack 15cm from the source of heat and preheat the broiler. Sprinkle 2 tsp demerara sugar evenly over the top of each custard. Broil until the sugar caramelizes. Serve immediately.
